levels.description:
The next heal grants the target a <$ba.barrier>Barrier</> that lasts for <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds
The barrier can absorb damage equal to <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of Shining's ATK and increases the target's DEF by <@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</>; <@ba.rem>Can store {ct} charge(s)</>
